books.title: Hard Times
books.author: Charles Dickens
books.summary: A wealthy man in the industrial north of England raises his children on purely rational principles, with unfortunate results.

books.title: The First Sir Percy
books.author: Baroness Orczy
books.summary: A man and his followers try again to overthrow the Stadtholder of the Netherlands.

books.title: The Autobiography of Ma-Ka-Tai-Me-She-Kia-Kiak, or Black Hawk
books.author: Black Hawk
books.summary: The autobiography of Black Hawk, the famous leader of the Native American Sauk tribe and central figure in the Black Hawk War of 1832.

books.title: Eminent Victorians
books.author: Lytton Strachey
books.summary: Four witty and biting biographies of Victorians that take aim at the moral superiority of their subject’s time.

books.title: Catriona
books.author: Robert Louis Stevenson
books.summary: After coming into his fortune and evading his uncle’s schemes, young gentleman David Balfour continues his adventures in 18th century Scotland, helping a politically unwelcome friend escape into France, avoiding the hangman himself, finding his place as a gentleman in Edinburgh society, and falling in love with the daughter of a notorious Macgregor clansman.

books.title: Arms and the Man
books.author: George Bernard Shaw
books.summary: A humorous examination of human hypocrisy and war’s stupidity in the midst of the Serbo-Bulgarian war.

books.title: Twelfth Night
books.author: William Shakespeare
books.summary: A woman disguises herself as a man and becomes entangled in the courtship of two aristocrats.

books.title: A Voyage to Arcturus
books.author: David Lindsay
books.summary: One man’s journey through a psychedelic alien landscape of philosophy, religion, life, and death.

books.title: The Poisoned Chocolates Case
books.author: Anthony Berkeley
books.summary: A club of amateur sleuths attempts to solve a crime whose solution has eluded Scotland Yard.

books.title: Ghost Stories
books.author: E. F. Benson
books.summary: A collection of ghost stories by E. F. Benson.

books.title: Recollections of Full Years
books.author: Helen Herron Taft
books.summary: Helen Herron Taft, wife of William Howard Taft, the twenty-seventh President of the United States, recalls her life married to one of America’s most influential political figures.

books.title: The Phantom of the Opera
books.author: Gaston Leroux
books.summary: A mysterious presence terrorizes the Paris Opera.

books.title: History of the Peloponnesian War
books.author: Thucydides
books.summary: A contemporary history of the ancient Greek war between Athens and Sparta and their allies.

books.title: The Practice and Theory of Bolshevism
books.author: Bertrand Russell
books.summary: Bertrand Russell travels to post-revolutionary Russia to see if Bolshevism achieves its communist aspirations.

books.title: Poetry
books.author: Langston Hughes
books.summary: A collection of poems by Langston Hughes.

books.title: The Devil’s Dictionary
books.author: Ambrose Bierce
books.summary: A witty, sharp collection of sardonic word definitions from the 1800s and early 1900s that provide a snapshot into the irreverent humor of early American culture.

books.title: Search the Sky
books.author: Frederik Pohl
books.summary: A man visits several worlds as he attempts to discover why humanity is dying out.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Poul Anderson
books.summary: A collection of science fiction short stories by Poul Anderson ordered by date of publication.

books.title: The Kingdom of God Is Within You
books.author: Leo Tolstoy
books.summary: Tolstoy describes true Christianity as a non-hierarchical, nonviolent, non-coercive pursuit, and criticizes institutional Christianity as a deceptive corruption.

books.title: A Negro Explorer at the North Pole
books.author: Matthew Henson
books.summary: The self-told story of the black man who accompanied Robert Peary during the first trip to the North Pole.
